mapper.insert: insert into alg_cash_his (tra_sn, usr_sn, cash_src, currency, credit_per_unit, cash, cust_no, status, cash_time, create_time) values (#{traSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usrSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cashSrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creditPerUnit,jdbcType=REAL}, #{cash,jdbcType=REAL}, #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cashTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update alg_cash_his set usr_sn = #{usrSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cash_src = #{cashSrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, currency = #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, credit_per_unit = #{creditPerUnit,jdbcType=REAL}, cash = #{cash,jdbcType=REAL}, cust_no = #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cash_time = #{cashTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where tra_sn = #{traSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select tra_sn, usr_sn, cash_src, currency, credit_per_unit, cash, cust_no, status, cash_time, create_time from alg_cash_his where tra_sn = #{traSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select tra_sn, usr_sn, cash_src, currency, credit_per_unit, cash, cust_no, status, cash_time, create_time from alg_cash_his
